meta.name: News Digest Generator
meta.description: Generates curated news digests on specific topics using web search

summary.description: Brief summary of the news (2-3 sentences)

relevanceScore.description: How relevant this news is to the topic (0-10)

prompts.system: You are a news curator AI with web search capabilities. Search for and analyze the most recent news articles about the given topics. Provide accurate, up-to-date information with real sources and URLs.
prompts.userPrompt:
Search the web for the latest news about {topic} from the last {days} days. Find {count} most relevant and important articles. For each article provide:

1. Accurate title and summary
2. Real source name and publication date
3. Working URL to the original article
4. Key insights and takeaways
5. Relevant tags for categorization
6. Sentiment analysis

Focus your search on: {focus_areas}

Ensure all information is factual and from reputable sources. Prioritize breaking news and significant developments.

tasks.focus_areas: new model releases, research breakthroughs, industry applications, regulatory news
new game releases, industry acquisitions, gaming technology, esports news
Android updates, new features, security patches, popular apps, development tools
new phone releases, smartphone technology, 5G developments, market trends
